Job Description We are looking for a Systems Engineering co-op to join our Headquarters System Engineering team working on the Land Command Support System (LCSS). LCSS provides the Canadian Armed Forces with the highly integrated command and control communications system they need. A highly integrated tactical system composed of communication, networking and information management sub-systems, LCSS is part of every Canadian Army vehicle, weapon platform and headquarters; comprising hardware, firmware and software.. As a Systems Engineering co-op on the LCSS team, you can expect to: • Perform development of system architecture and requirements; • Support Metrics development and presentation; • Participate in systems and software design, use cases, and trade studies; • Execute written test plans and test procedures; • Identify system defects, resolve issues and verify solutions have been correctly implemented; • Participate in an Agile team; Document the analysis, design and test in accordance with development standards. • Additional Information We believe the unique contributions of each of our colleagues are key in our ability to drive innovation. By fostering a culture of belonging, encouraging idea sharing at all levels, and reinforcing the very real impact of what we do, we offer an environment where everyone can take pride in their work.
